Sequence Information.Peptide Name: Staphylococcin C55alpha (SacAalpha; chain alpha of Staphylococcin C55; Bacteriocin)
Sequence Information.Family: Belongs to the lantibiotic family (Class I bacteriocin)
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Gram-positive bacteria:Staphylococcus aureus and Micrococcus luteus (C55alpha and C55beta work synergistically at a ratio of 1:1).
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: No hemolysis information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry

Literature.Title: Two-component anti-Staphylococcus aureus lantibiotic activity produced by Staphylococcus aureus C55.
Literature.Author: Navaratna MA, Sahl HG, Tagg JR.

Literature.Title: Identification of genes encoding two-component lantibiotic production in Staphylococcus aureus C55 and other phage group II Staphylococcus aureus strains and demonstration of an association with the exfoliative toxin B gene.
Literature.Author: Navaratna MA, Sahl HG, Tagg JR.
